name: Vile (itch) (MegaTheVile)
description:
A short text-based puzzle game I made for college. Playable in your browser!

Notes: 

-The "stuff" screen can only be opened on a certain screen.

-You can only combine two items, however the combined item can then be combined with another item.

-You can go into fullscreen by pressing the hard-to-see button on the bottom right.

-The back arrow is for losers.(Don't use it to go back, it doesn't save your progress)

-The Molotov is a useless item made back when this game was going to have RPG-like elements. You can try and find it, if you want. I guess finishing with it could be considered the "True true ending".

-Yes I know the alleyway picture sucks ass I made it in 5 minutes using assets from my other games.

-These are what the Sharp-Toothed man and "Lizardman" (who wasn't even used much in this story )  were supposed to look like.  Couldn't finish inking their designs in time before turning it in.
